title: Most hilarious unexpected victory?
body:
I just played a game where i called Jungle Wawrick but another player ignored me and went Jungle Kha'Zix. 

I thought F**** it, I'll stay jg anyway since the whole team acknowledged I called first. So we had 2 jungle. I let him go one way and I went another. I went tanky and he went assassin. It totally worked. We won! 

My best game though was when some guy locked in mid after my friend called first, so we both went mid with him as a troll. 3 mid. We won!!!! 

What about you?

replies.body:
I was first pick mid in ranked so the jg offered to swap to avoid counter play. So i got them lee and they got me ahri. They forgot to swap so i went lee mid with ap runes and heal and she took smite with ad runes as ahri jg. 

Thought that was gonna be a guaranteed loss but ahri carried and we won....
Well ..... I was in a ranks game . Normal lanes ... They had destroyed our nexus towers and were taunting on our dying nexus ... Then we ace them and push mid  and win :))))
